fields.name: Ensnare:
fields.value: Set a Trap. The trap will attack one person who visits it (in the case where there are multiple visitors, it will attack the person with the lowest Attack Power). Then, the trap will destroy itself, and you will learn the roles of all other visitors. If the trap attacks someone the same night you set it, your name and role are revealed to the visitors.

fields.name: Prison Realm Mayhem (1x):
fields.value: Set a series of traps at a target's house. You will indirectly attack every direct visitor to your target. This ability will ignore attempts to outright block it rather than defend against it (see The Man in the Wall)

fields.name: Revolving Prison (Passive):
fields.value: Every night that are you are idle, or have 0 available traps, you will spend the night building a Trap. You may have any number Traps available to place, but only one placed at a time. If you set a trap the same night your previous trap is triggered, it will still attack its target.
